Reviewing

Conference Committees and Reviewing

(Some highlights – additional items on CV)

International Symposium on End-User Development (IS-EUD)

  • 2017     Program Committee Member Steering Committee Member
  • 2016     Steering Committee Member
  • 2015     Steering Committee Member
  • 2014     Steering Committee Member
  • 2013     Program Co-Chair and Steering Committee Member
  • 2011     Program Committee Member

IEEE Symposium on Visual Languages and Human-Centric Computing (VL/HCC)

  • 2015     Program Committee Member
  • 2014     Program Committee Member
  • 2009     Program Committee Member
  • 2008     Program Committee Member

IEEE International Conference on Global Software Engineering (ICGSE)

  • 2017     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2016     Conference Chair and Steering Committee Member
  • 2015     Program Committee Member

IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE, formerly Knowledge-Based Software Engineering)

  • 2015     Workshop Organizer (see next subsection)
  • 2012     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2011     Program Committee Member, Steering Committee Member, Doctoral Consortium Panelist
  • 2010     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2009     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2008     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2007     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2006     Steering Committee Member
  • 2005     Conference Chair and Steering Committee Member
  • 2004     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2003     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2002     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2001     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 2000     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 1999     Program Committee Member and Steering Committee Member
  • 1998     Program Co-Chair
  • 1997     Program Committee Member
  • 1996     Panels and Tutorials Chair and Program Committee Member

Symposium On Usable Privacy and Security (SOUPS)

  • 2008     Program Committee Member
  • 2007     Program Committee Member

ACM Conference on Computer-Supported Cooperative Work (CSCW)

  • 2016     Reviewer
  • 2015     Program Committee Member
  • 2010     Reviewer
  • 2006     Reviewer
  • 2002     Reviewer

Program Committee Member for the Second International Workshop on Emotion Awareness in Software Engineering (SEmotion 2017) held in conjunction with the Thirty-ninth International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2017).

Program Committee Member for the Student Research Competition held in conjunction with the 10th Joint Meeting of the European Software Engineering Conference and the ACM SIGSOFT Symposium on the Foundations of Software Engineering (ESEC/FSE 2015 – SRC).

Program Committee Member for the International Workshop on Cooperative and Human Aspects of Software Engineering (CHASE 2011, CHASE 2013).

Reviewer for Additional Conferences

  • Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI 2007, 2008, 2009, 2015, 2016)
  • Eclipse Technology Exchange Workshop at OOPSLA 2006 (ETX 2006)
  • ACM Conference on Hypertext and Hypermedia (Hypertext 2000, 2001, 2003)
  • Computer Support for Collaborative Learning (CSCL 2002)
  • ACM Symposium on User Interface Software and Technology (UIST 1996, 2000, 2001, 2014)
  • International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 1997)
  • International Conference on Application and Theory of Petri Nets (1993)

Journal Special Issues Edited

Joint guest editor with M. Gerosa, P. Bjorn, and A. Sarma for the Springer Open Journal of Internet Services and Applications (JISA), Thematic Series on Software Engineering from a Social Network Perspective, targeted for 2015.

Joint guest editor with B. Nardi for Computer-supported Cooperative Work, Special Issue on Activity Theory and the Practice of Design, Vol. 11, No. 1-2, 2002.

Joint guest editor with B. Nuseibeh for Automated Software Engineering, Special Issue of Selected Papers from the Thirteenth IEEE International Conference on Automated Software Engineering, Vol. 7, No. 2, May 2000.
